verses.verse: "Why <S%H4069><s%> are times <S%H6256><s%> not stored <S%H6845><s%> up by the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> And why do those who know <S%H3045><s%> Him not see <S%H2372><s%> His days <S%H3117><s%>?
"Some remove <S%H5381><s%> the landmarks; <S%H1367><s%> They seize <S%H1497><s%> and devour <S%H7462><s%> flocks. <S%H5739><s%>
"They drive <S%H5090><s%> away <S%H5090><s%> the donkeys <S%H2543><s%> of the orphans; <S%H3490><s%> They take <S%H9111><s%> the widow's ox <S%H7794><s%> for a pledge. <S%H9111><s%>

"They push <S%H5186><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> from the road; <S%H1870><s%> The poor <S%H6041><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> are made to hide <S%H2244><s%> themselves altogether. <S%H3162><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> as wild <S%H6501><s%> donkeys <S%H6501><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> They go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> seeking <S%H7836><s%> food <S%H2964><s%> in their activity, <S%H6467><s%> As bread <S%H3899><s%> for [their] children <S%H5288><s%> in the desert. <S%H6160><s%>
"They harvest <S%H7114><s%> their fodder <S%H1098><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> And they glean <S%H3953><s%> the vineyard <S%H3754><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

"They spend <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3885><s%> naked, <S%H6174><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> clothing, <S%H3830><s%> And have <S%H369><s%> no <S%H369><s%> covering <S%H3682><s%> against the cold. <S%H7135><s%>
"They are wet <S%H7372><s%> with the mountain <S%H2022><s%> rains, <S%H2230><s%> And they hug <S%H2263><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> for want <S%H1097><s%> of a shelter. <S%H4268><s%>
"Others snatch <S%H1497><s%> the orphan <S%H3490><s%> from the breast, <S%H9582><s%> And against <S%H5921><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> they take <S%H9111><s%> a pledge. <S%H9111><s%>

"They cause [the poor] to go <S%H1980><s%> about naked <S%H6174><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> clothing, <S%H3830><s%> And they take <S%H5375><s%> away <S%H5375><s%> the sheaves <S%H6016><s%> from the hungry. <S%H7457><s%>
"Within <S%H996><s%> the walls <S%H7791><s%> they produce <S%H6671><s%> oil; <S%H6671><s%> They tread <S%H1869><s%> wine <S%H3342><s%> presses <S%H3342><s%> but thirst. <S%H6770><s%>

"From the city <S%H5892><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> groan, <S%H5008><s%> And the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the wounded <S%H2491><s%> cry <S%H7768><s%> out; Yet God <S%H433><s%> does not pay <S%H7760><s%> attention <S%H7760><s%> to folly. <S%H8604><s%>

"Others <S%H1992><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> with those who rebel <S%H4775><s%> against the light; <S%H216><s%> They do not want to know <S%H5234><s%> its ways, <S%H1870><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> in its paths. <S%H9350><s%>

"The murderer <S%H7523><s%> arises <S%H6965><s%> at dawn; <S%H216><s%> He kills <S%H6991><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and the needy, <S%H34><s%> And at night <S%H3915><s%> he is as a thief. <S%H1590><s%>

"And the eye <S%H5869><s%> of the adulterer <S%H5003><s%> waits <S%H8104><s%> for the twilight, <S%H5399><s%> Saying, <S%H559><s%> 'No <S%H3808><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> will see <S%H7789><s%> me.' And he disguises <S%H7760><s%> <S%H5643><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%>
"In the dark <S%H2822><s%> they dig <S%H2864><s%> into houses, <S%H1004><s%> They shut <S%H2856><s%> themselves up by day; <S%H3119><s%> They do not know <S%H3045><s%> the light. <S%H216><s%>

"For the morning <S%H1242><s%> is the same <S%H9191><s%> to him as thick <S%H6757><s%> darkness, <S%H6757><s%> For he is familiar <S%H5234><s%> with the terrors <S%H1091><s%> of thick <S%H6757><s%> darkness. <S%H6757><s%>

"They are insignificant <S%H7031><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the water; <S%H4325><s%> Their portion <S%H2513><s%> is cursed <S%H7043><s%> on the earth. <S%H776><s%> They do not turn <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the vineyards. <S%H3754><s%>
"Drought <S%H6723><s%> and heat <S%H2527><s%> consume <S%H1497><s%> the snow <S%H7950><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> [So does] Sheol <S%H7585><s%> [those who] have sinned. <S%H2398><s%>

"But He drags <S%H4900><s%> off the valiant <S%H47><s%> by His power; <S%H3581><s%> He rises, <S%H6965><s%> but no <S%H3808><s%> one has <S%H539><s%> assurance <S%H539><s%> of life. <S%H9132><s%>
"He provides <S%H5414><s%> them with security, <S%H983><s%> and they are supported; <S%H8172><s%> And His eyes <S%H5869><s%> are on their ways. <S%H1870><s%>
